basic_information.scholarship_name: Charles C. Estes Endowed Photography Scholarship
basic_information.committee_name: CLA - Mass Comm Charles C. Estes

description: The recipient(s) of the Charles C. Estes Photography Scholarship must meet the following criteria: Complete application and transcript Declared minor or major in Photography Minimum 3.0 GPA Enrolled in 12 credit hours Active in Mass Communications activities--and/or Photography Club Essay of 250 words describing how you became interested in photography along with any plans for using photography in a future career. Preference given to a student awarded the prior year if they continue to meet the scholarship criteria

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship

criteria.description: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"
criteria.raw_text: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"

criteria.description: SIS_Minor is Mass Comm-Photographic Arts   or SIS_Minor is Photographic Arts   or SIS_Minor is Journalism-Photographic Arts   or SIS_Major is Photographic Arts   or SIS_Major is Mass Comm-Photographic Arts   or SIS_Major is Journalism-Photographic Arts   or SIS_Major is Art-Photographic Arts
criteria.raw_text: SIS_Minor is Mass Comm-Photographic Arts   or SIS_Minor is Photographic Arts   or SIS_Minor is Journalism-Photographic Arts   or SIS_Major is Photographic Arts   or SIS_Major is Mass Comm-Photographic Arts   or SIS_Major is Journalism-Photographic Arts   or SIS_Major is Art-Photographic Arts
criteria.clean_description: Major: Art-Photographic Arts, Journalism-Photographic Arts, Mass Comm-Photographic Arts, Photographic Arts | Minor: Journalism-Photographic Arts, Mass Comm-Photographic Arts, Photographic Arts
